'''GENSHIN CONCERT 2022 "Melodies of an Endless Journey"''' is a collection of pre-recorded performances featuring a number of outstanding musicians and pop music groups to reinterpret [[Genshin Impact]]'s well-loved [[soundtrack]]s. It was [https://youtu.be/LrqsaO9Cf2M released] as a premier at 12am UTC+8 during 12 October 2022 on [https://www.youtube.com/@GenshinImpact Genshin Impact's Official Youtube Channel]
